item.title: Ditch List, use Dict in Python
item.description: So, one day I was using too much list & wondered why we canâ€™t use dict all the time when it has O(1) time complexity. Instead of pondering I tried to measure things myself & see. I ended up measuring access time in a dict & in a list. Below is the code. import time d = dict() for i in range(10000000): d[i] = True e = list() for i in range(10000000): e.
